Create a visual reminder: Use post-it notes to write down important tasks and stick them on your computer screen or office wall as visual reminders.
Create a to-do list: Write down tasks or ideas on post-it notes, then organize them by priority before pasting them on a corkboard or bulletin board.
Create a mood board: Cut post-it notes into different shapes and sizes to create a mood board for a project or event.
Decorate a space: Stick post-it notes on walls, doors, and windows to add a pop of color and creativity to a space.
Create a game: Play a game where you have to brainstorm as many different uses for a post-it note as you can before time is up.
